Link your Steam Account: 

1) Visit Profile > Account Settings > Steam.  Upon linking your profile, return to to this page.  If your profiles is still not present, use the menu to the right to manually update your profile cache.  

2) Click Edit Profile above.  Find the Steam ID custom profile field and populate it with your Steam ID.  

Valid Steam Input format for Profile Field:

  • Steam Name: steamcommunity.com/id/XXXXXXXXX/  Where XXXXXXXXX is your Steam Name
  • 17 digit Steam ID: ex. 76561197961234567
  • Old school Steam ID: ex. STEAM_0:0:1234567
